subject: Homosexuality
Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Discrimination
Athletics and Sports
Wrestling
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: A world-class English rugby star and a three-time college all-American wrestler are some of the world’s highest-profile straight athletes speaking out for gay rights.
snippet: A world-class English rugby star and a three-time college all-American wrestler are some of the world’s highest-profile straight athletes speaking out for gay rights.
